details: At least 27 people were killed  and 9 were injured when ADF Rebels attacked the town of Beni in the Democratic Republic of the Congo most of the dead were church members as well, at least 4 rebels were killed as well.[193][194][195][196]

20 people including 8 UN Peacekeepers and 12 Congo Soldiers were killed as well as 10 others injured in an attack by the Allied Democratic Forces during a military operation by the UN Soldiers near Beni.[206][207][208]
17 soldiers and civilians were killed when presumed members of the Allied Democratic Forces attacked villages near Beni with machetes.[47][48]
The Allied Democratic Forces (ADF) attacked Congolese army positions and several neighborhoods in Beni. They killed 15 people and abducted at least a dozen children.[232][233]
14 people were kidnapped and killed by the Allied Democratic Forces in Congo.[61]
Mai-Mai militants armed with machetes killed 14 people and injured 9 people in DRC's Rubaya Village located in the North Kivu region.[58]

Armed Mai-Mai gunmen attacked a military camp in Djugu with rifles and arrows killing at least 11 people and injuring 9. According to witnesses, civilians were among the dead and at least 3 soldiers were also killed.[38]
At least ten civilians were killed and two others were seriously injured during an armed attack staged for Ugandan rebels, in Mbau village, Beni Territory.[181]
7 civilians and 3 soldiers were killed when ADF rebels attacked an army position in a village close to Beni. 2 other soldiers were left wounded in the attack.[102][103]
10 civilians were killed and another one was injured, when suspected ADF rebels attacked by gunfire and machetes a village in Beni, the gunmen also looted animals.[85][86]
Presumed ADF rebels attacked a village in Oicha, causing the deaths of at least 10 people. The gunmen also looted several houses.[94][95][96]

At least 10 people are dead and 10 others are missing after militants attacked outlying areas of the eastern city of Beni. A terrorist from the Ugandan Allied Democratic Forces was also killed.[224][225]
Eight members of a family were beheaded by members of Kamuina Nsapu, the town of Molumbela, Kasaï-Central.[119]
8 civilians were killed in an attack in a neighborhood in Ocha by the Allied Democratic Forces group. The attackers also burned more than five houses and looted two others.[379][380]
Allied Democratic Forces Rebels killed at least 7 people and abducted 15 others including 10 children in a series of raids and attacks in the DRC's North Kivu province.[37]
Seven civilians were killed in an attack on a village by the Allied Democratic Forces.[104][105]
Seven people were killed, when ADF rebels attacked civilians and army positions in the area of Beni in North Kivu. The militants wielded guns and machetes at the victims.[83][84]

Six people including a woman were killed by presumed ADF militants in the city of Beni. The presumed ADF attackers also kidnapped 5 people including the 2 children of the woman who was killed and set on fire a house and two cars, the attackers also stole several goats, looted markets and homes.[136][137]
Five rangers and a driver were killed and another was injured during an attack in the Virunga National Park, Kivu province, Democratic Republic of Congo.[70]

Five civilians and a soldier were killed by armed assailants in Goma city of North Kivu. Witnesses and the MP as well as the provincial deputy Jean-Paul Lumbulu have suspected FDLR. A civilian was also kidnapped.[26]
attacker: Democratic Forces for the Liberation of Rwanda (suspected)

details: ADF militants attacked an army outpost in Beni, Democratic Republic of Congo killing at least 6 people.[28]
ADF militants attacked civilians in DRC's North Kivu province killing 5 and injuring a peacekeeper from South Africa.[102][103]
At least five Congolese soldiers were killed, another thirteen were injured, and ten rebels were killed during a series of clashes near Beni, Democrartic Republic of Congo.[220]

Gunmen of the Allied Democratic Forces, attacked a village in the city of Beni, killing 5 people and injuring 3 others. In addition to that, 3 people were also left missing and several goats were stolen by the gunmen.[204][205]

Clashes broke out between security forces and Mai-Mai rebels in the eastern city of the DRC, Goma when the Mai-Mai rebels tried to attack a protest. 5 civilians were killed and 2 others were injured.[289]
ADF rebels attacked a village in DRC's Oicha with machetes killing 4 civilians and wounding several as well as burning and looting more than 17 houses and shops.[222][223]
Two village chiefs were killed during an armed assault for members of Kawmina Nsapu. The leaders were executed for refusing to join the movement-[62]
In different attacks three people were killed, two women raped and four persons kidnapped by armed men.[290]

Three civilians were killed in an attack by terrorists of the Allied Democratic Forces on the Beni - Kasindi road in the Beni territory of North Kivu province. Two attackers were also killed in the incident.[103]
